job.title: Data Scientist, Insights & Analytics
job.description: Virta is the first company with a clinicallyproven treatment to safely and sustainably reverse type2 diabetes without the use of medications or surgery Our innovations in nutritional biochemistry data science and digital tools combined with our clinical expertise are shifting the diabetes treatment paradigm from management to reversal Our mission reverse type 2 diabetes in 100 million people by 2025ltbrgtltbrgtAs a full stack health care company of physicians engineers marketers and more under one roof Virta collects comprehensive data on our patients experience and leverages this data to build the next generation of health care for chronic diseases Here at Virta we rely heavily on Data and Analytics to demonstrate the value of the Virta Treatment to our customers both patient outcomes and ROI We collect and organize disparate forms of patient data from both internal and external sources clinical data from our continuous remote care platform coupled with claims and eligibility data provided by our customers to generate insightful reports and do complex analyses We are looking for a data scientist with experience working with healthcare data to help us collect organize and analyze this data as well as generate insights and reports that we can share with our customersltbrgtltbrgtCheck out our technical blog to find out how Virta is developing the next generation of healthcare technology ltugthttpswwwvirtahealthcomhealthtechltbrgtltbrgtltugtltemgtThis role is open to remote applicants so please apply regardless of your locationltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligtQuantify the economic impact of Virta on the healthcare system and devise insights to share with Virta decision makers and enterprise partnersltligt ltligtBuild pipelines that translate claims clinical and engagement data from our warehouse to polished reports and clientready analytics with an eye towards scalable solutionsltligt ltligtInterface directly with our Sales and Customer Success teams to determine how to best leverage our data to improve client relationshipsltligt ltligtSupport our billing and finance teams in ensuring integrity of reporting for forecasting and corporate reportingltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggt90 Day PlanltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtWithin your first 90 days at Virta we expect you will do the followingltbrgtltulgt ltligtTeach and inspire your team members through knowledge sharing pair programming andor giving feedback during code reviewsltligt ltligtModel value of the Virta treatment and calculate expected savings based on claims and internal dataltligt ltligtCreate customer reports annual business reviews monthly outbound reportingltligt ltligtProvide analytics support to our various business units to answer questions about our business patients outcomes etcltligt ltligtImmerse yourself in the rich longitudinal data we collect on our patientsltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtMustHavesltbrgtltstronggtltulgt ltligt35 years in a Data Science Healthcare Analytics BI or similar roleltligt ltligt2 years working with healthcare administrative data experience claims clinical outcomes population health etcltligt ltligtFamiliarity with data capture ETL validation and test methods to standardize and automate analysesltligt ltligtProficient in SQL and relational databasesltligt ltligtExperience using varied statistical methods using Python R or similarltligt ltligtAbility to partner with the Data Infrastructure teams to inform infrastructure roadmap to best support your workltligt ltligtExperience working with crossfunctional business partners to understand analytics or reporting needsltligt ltligtNice to haveltbrgtltulgt ltligtAdvanced degree MPHMSPhD in Data Science Stats or similarltligt ltligtExperience working at a technology company bonus points for working at a fullstack company or marketplace where there is a complex relationship between different types of users ltligt ltligtProficient in Looker Airflow Jupyter Pandasltligt ltligtExperience calculating cost savings or economic impact of a value based programltligt ltulgt ltligt ltbrgtltulgtltstronggtValuesdriven cultureltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtVirtas company values drive our culture so youll do well ifltbrgtltulgt ltligtYou put people first and take care of yourself your peers and our patients equallyltligt ltligtYou have a strong sense of ownership and take initiative while empowering others to do the sameltligt ltligtYou prioritize positive impact over busy workltligt ltligtYou have no ego and understand that everyone has something to bring to the table regardless of experienceltligt ltligtYou appreciate transparency and promote trust and empowerment through open access of informationltligt ltligtYou are evidencebased and prioritize data and science over seniority or dogmaltligt ltligtYou take risks and rapidly iterateltligt ltbrgtltulgtltemgtAs part of your duties at Virta you may come in contact with sensitive patient information that is governed by HIPAA Throughout your career at Virta you will be expected to follow Virtas security and privacy procedures to ensure our patients information remains strictly confidential Security and privacy training will be providedltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtFor this role the compensation range for candidates in Colorado is ltemgtltemgt122846  159699ltemgtltemgt information about Virtas benefits is on our careers page at httpswwwvirtahealthcomcareers ltbrgtltbrgtltemgtltemgtNote Starting pay will be based on a number of factors and commensurate with qualifications ampamp experience Virta has a location based compensation structure there may be a
